Uses of Package
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log

  • Packages that use com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log 
    Package Description
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.analytics
    Useful when it comes to handle analytics reporting in an industrial way.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
    Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.appwidget
    Handles Android desktop widgets.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache
    Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config
    Contains a compact framework for handling the process configuration.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.content
    This package is a counterpart of the android.content Android package.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
    Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework
    Defines some common types used throughout the library.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log
    Wraps and frameworks the Android menu feature.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ui
    Some User Interface (UI) widgets.
    com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws
    A framework for the Web Services (WS).

    Class and Description
    Logger
    Just in order to have various loggers.
    LoggerFactory.LoggerConfigurator
    The interface that should be implemented through the SmartConfigurator class (with no package name, because of Android restriction), in order to indicate to the framework which Logger implementation should be used.
